subject: p17318449
History: Evaluate for resolution of right lower lobe pneumonia diagnosed .
Findings: PA and lateral radiographs of the chest demonstrate clear lungs, without evidence of right lower lobe consolidation. There is no pleural effusion or pneumothorax. The hilar and cardiomediastinal contours are normal. Pulmonary vascularity is normal. Chronic findings of intact sternal cerclage wires as well as unfolded configuration of the aorta are once again noted.
Impression: No evidence of residual right lower lobe pneumonia.
